overview:
Peter has been a General Partner at Advent Venture Partners in London since 1999, following six years with Schroder Ventures (now Permira) in their technology team, based in Paris.

Peter has 15 years experience in investing in growing technology businesses, both early-stage and later stage companies. Previously, he has worked in software development with Picker International and in business and IT consulting with PriceWaterhouseCoopers.

He serves on the boards of several portfolio companies, including Dailymotion, AmberFin and Snell. He holds a BSc from Imperial College, London and a MBA from INSEAD.
